The short covalent bond distances and angles in Pnm2 1-As are presented in Extended Data Table 2. Bonding distances and angles are useful indicators of chemical bonding properties and orbitals of bonding electrons and allow comparisons among crystalline polymorphs. As with four pair positions can be divided into two groups with average bond angles greater (As3 (98.2°) and As4 (96.3°)) or smaller (As1′ (89.4°) and As2 (94.0°)) than the average value of 94.45°.
